Sha256
sha256
. Getting a file hash
Purpose
: Calculating the hash sum of a file
Syntax:
Parameter.
You need to specify the file, the hash sum of which is calculated. The checksum is calculated using the HmacSHA256 mechanism.
The attribute selected should contain one file.
Use case.
To calculate the hash sum of a file, write down the following:
